item.title: Doctor believes bullet exited through Hadi’s skull
item.description: Doctors at Dhaka Medical College Hospital say the bullet that struck Sharif Osman bin Hadi may have passed clean through his skull. Zahid Raihan, the neurosurgeon who operated on him, says Hadi is in “extremely critical” condition and that they are unable to offer any hopeful updates.
